alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 4:06PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade County through 500 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meade State Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Meade County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
